autotest.name: Autotools test suite
autotest.desc: Part of the GNU Auto-Tools for automated Tests

bison.name: Bison - Gnu parser generator
bison.desc: Bison is a general-purpose parser generator that converts an annotated context-free grammar into a deterministic LR or generalized LR (GLR) parser employing LALR(1) parser tables.

flex.name: flex: The Fast Lexical Analyzer
flex.desc: Flex is a tool for generating scanners. A scanner, sometimes called a tokenizer, is a program which recognizes lexical patterns in text. The flex program reads user-specified input files, or its standard input if no file names are given, for a description of a scanner to generate.

gengetopt.name: GNU Gengetopt
gengetopt.desc: Gengetopt generates a C function that uses getopt_long function to parse the command line options, to validate them and fills a struct .

kc++.name: Kimwitu++ - The Term processor
kc++.desc: Kimwitu++ is a tool for processing trees (i.e. terms). It is a meta tool: Kimwitu++ can be used for generating software - especially when building compilers.

lcov.name: LCOV
lcov.desc: LCOV is a graphical front-end for GCC's coverage testing tool gcov. It collects gcov data for multiple source files and creates HTML pages containing the source code annotated with coverage information.

libtool.name: GNU Libtool - The GNU Portable Library Tool
libtool.desc: GNU libtool is a generic library support script. Libtool hides the complexity of using shared libraries behind a consistent, portable interface.

valgrind.name: Valgrind
valgrind.desc: Valgrind is an instrumentation framework for building dynamic analysis tools. There are Valgrind tools that can automatically detect many memory management and threading bugs, and profile your programs in detail.
